title: Did Saudis Fly Out of the U.S. While Airspace Was Still Closed after 9/11?
subtitle: Rumor holds that a secret flight whisked prominent Saudis and Osama bin Laden's relatives out of the USA during a ban on air travel.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Secret flights whisked bin Laden family members and Saudi nationals out of the U.S. immediately after September 11 while a general ban on air travel was still in effect, and before the FBI had any opportunity to question any of the passengers.
